name: Dima
summary: Even from school, I had an inclination towards such subjects as mathematics and physics. But after school, it happened that I turned to the path of humanities and after university, I worked in the field of sales. After the pandemic, I reconsidered my plans for the future and decided to master the field that I understand and to which I have an inclination. At the moment, I have been learning the frontend for about 5 months.
